name: Fancy Image Show
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
Fancy Image Show WordPress plugin is a simple image rotation plugin. The image rotation happens with five different fancy effects, so it is named fancy image show.

Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/11/06/fancy-image-show-wordpress-plugin/

  • Live Demo
  • More info

Fancy Image Show WordPress plugin is a simple image rotation plugin. The image rotation happens with five different fancy effects, so it is named fancy image show. We can create many galleries in the same posts and pages. In the admin we have option to enter the image folder location.

Available Fancy Effect

  • Zipper Effect
  • Wave Effect
  • Curtain Effect
  • Fountain Top Effect
  • Random Top Effect

We can configure this plug-in in three different way.

For more information check this link : http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2011/11/06/fancy-image-show-wordpress-plugin/

Translators

  • English (en_EN) – Gopi Ramasamy
  • Serbo-Croatian (sr_RS) – Andrijana Nikolic
  • Polish (pl) – Abdul

sections.changelog:
1.0

First version.

2.0

Tested UpTo 3.3

3.0

Tested UpTo 3.4

4.0

JavaScript loaded by using the wp_enqueue_scripts hook (instead of the init hook)
Slight change in the short code, Please find the new short code for your gallery

5.0

New demo link

6.0

Option to set widget gallery

6.1

Tested up to WordPress 3.5
Avoid registering the alternate jQuery.
From this version we are using existing wordpress jQuery.

7.0

Tested up to 3.6
New admin interface.
Added few security features.

7.1

  1. Tested up to 3.8
  2. Now this plugin supports localization (or internationalization). i.e. option to translate into other languages.
    Plugin *.po file (fancy-image-show.po) available in the languages folder.

7.2

  1. Tested up to 3.9
  2. Added little security feature.

7.3

  1. Tested up to 4.0

7.4

  1. Tested up to 4.1

7.5

  1. Tested up to 4.2.2

7.6

  1. Tested up to 4.3

7.7

  1. Tested up to 4.4
  2. Text Domain slug has been added for Language Packs.

7.8

  1. Tested up to 4.5
  2. Sanitization added for all input value.

7.9

  1. Tested up to 4.6

8.0

  1. Tested up to 4.7

8.1

  1. Tested up to 4.8

8.2

  1. Tested up to 4.9

8.3

  1. Tested up to 5.1
  2. Converted JS alert message into WP class file.

8.4

  1. Tested up to 5.2
  2. Uninstall option added. All plugin reference and plugin table will be cleared during uninstallation.

8.5

  1. Tested up to 5.3

8.6

  1. Tested up to 5.4

8.7

  1. Tested up to 5.5

8.8

  1. Tested up to 5.7

8.9

  1. Tested up to 5.8
  2. Use plugin short code in the widget.

9.0

  1. Tested up to 5.9

9.1

  1. Tested up to 6.4
